title: WE NEED A NEW SHADOW
body:
What about a new skin for Zed? I mean,I do main him but im really tired to play over and over again Shockblade Zed.
The SKT T1 is not of the best skins. All we need is a new skin for this guy{{champion:238}} .
Even Jinx got a new skin. I think they're too many other people who really wants a new skin for Zed.
Everyone is playing him now.

replies.body: I want a new skin for cait, and a new one for Varus. nobody is happy in this world.
Come si vede che non Ã¨ inglese....
